vulnerability.title: Ensure Chrony is only configured with the server directive
vulnerability.description: Check that Chrony only has time sources configured with the server directive.
vulnerability.recommendation: Review and remediate: Ensure Chrony is only configured with the server directive

triage_decision.reason: The rule concerns Chrony time source configuration and does not involve authentication, filesystem, or bootloader changes that could lock out access. It is a low‑risk configuration adjustment that can be safely applied.
